infos.title: Sage of the Lake
infos.like: His tribe, leisurely reading, fish and seafood dishes
infos.story: As the Empire expanded it's territory, the long occupying natives resisted relentlessly. However, the all eventually fell before the Empire's brutal military force as well as overwhelming technology. Dakaris' homeland, the reclusive Lake Eretana, hidden deep inside the mountains, was no exception. The Empire let the natives stay in their land, but by no means were they treated respect. To make things worse, the officers and nobles appointed to the area were mostly corrupted, making it even more difficult for the natives. The noble appointed to Lake Eretana was especially the worse. The atrocities grew worse each day, eventually leading to the deaths of young, and innocent Lizardmen. This lead to Dakaris to gather his tribe to get back their freedom.
infos.story_: As the Empire expanded its territory, the long occupying natives resisted relentlessly. However, they all eventually fell before the Empire's brutal military force as well as overwhelming technology. Dakaris' homeland, the reclusive Lake Eretana, hidden deep inside the mountains, was no exception. The Empire let the natives stay in their land, but by no means were they treated with respect. To make things worse, the officers and nobles appointed to the area were mostly corrupted, making it even more difficult for the natives. The noble appointed to Lake Eretana was especially the worse. The atrocities grew worse each day, eventually leading to the deaths of young, and innocent Lizardmen. This lead Dakaris to gather his tribe to get back their freedom. 'To soothe the spirits of my ancestors, and to liberate my tribe - I will not hesitate, I will take back our rightful future with the Resistance.' Currently, he is a key member of the Resistance, leading them with his wisdom and insight.

sw.story:
For a long time, Eretana's Lizardman have performed a rite for the sacred entity of the lake every year.
Altough that entity had never shown itself to others, it remembered the history, tradition, and academic knowledge of which the Lizardman researched, and helped them prosper.
However, the lake became rapidly desolated following the Empire's violent invasion and brutality, and all the legacy of the Lizardman, including their tradition and culture, were destroyed. To retrieve the land which the empire took by force, Dakaris decided to summon the ancient entity of the lake. Dakaris successfully managed to summon the sacred beast by placing all the mana he had into Armekith, the relic of his Lizardman ancestors.
After hearing what the Lizardman were going through as well as the reason why the lake was desolated, the sacred beast gladly offered its aid to Dakaris, and promised him that it will fulfill the will of the Lizardman gathered within Eretana lake since the beginning of time.
